R

readBoolean(String, String, String) - Static method in class view.StandardInput
Prints a question which can be answered by yes (true) or no (false).
readChoice(String, String, String) - Static method in class view.StandardInput
Prints a question which can be answered with two options.
readInt(String) - Static method in class view.StandardInput
Writes a prompt to standard out and tries to read an int value from standard in.
reset() - Method in class model.Board
Empties all fields of this Board (i.e., let them refer to the value Mark.XXX).
run() - Method in class controller.Client
Waits for the peer to end.
run() - Method in class controller.GameHandler
Plays the Connect Four game.
run() - Method in class controller.LocalGame
Runs the Connect Four game.
run() - Method in class controller.Peer
Runs the peer.
run() - Method in class controller.Server
Runs the server and waits for clients to connect.

Runs a ClientView thread.
